sentences.en: A visit to Singapore is incomplete without a look at Chinatown.
sentences.cn: 如果没去看过牛车水,那就不算真正到过新加坡.

sentences.en: And with that useful proviso, I would heartily recommend Paris's Chinatown.
sentences.cn: 带着这条有益的附加条款, 我热情推荐巴黎的唐人街.

sentences.en: Can you tell me how to get to Chinatown?
sentences.cn: 您能告诉我去唐人街怎么走 吗 ?

sentences.en: He doctored in Chinatown for many years.
He's a very famous person in Chinatown. He's also from your home city, Peking.
sentences.cn: 他在唐人街大名鼎鼎, 他也是从你的家乡北京来的.

sentences.en: Hmm, why do you take me to your favorite restaurant in Chinatown.
sentences.cn: 我早就知道你一定会提到吃的.

sentences.en: I'll take you to Chinatown for dim sum.
sentences.cn: 安:我还可以带你去唐人街品尝小吃.

sentences.en: It’s usually available in hardware stores and Chinatown.
sentences.cn: 它通常在五金商店和唐人街可以买到。

sentences.en: Miss, is this the right subway to go to Chinatown?
sentences.cn: 小姐, 这是去唐人街的地铁吗?

sentences.en: Occasionally they will take Stephen to some restaurant in Chinatown.
sentences.cn: 偶尔他们会带斯蒂芬到唐人街的一家餐馆去.

sentences.en: Returning to Chicago's Chinatown is always full of nostalgia for me.
sentences.cn: 再回到芝加哥的唐人街于我而言已饱含怀旧的意味.

sentences.en: Sir, is this the right subway to go to Chinatown?
sentences.cn: 先生, 这是去唐人街的地铁吗?

sentences.en: The small stage at the entrance of Chinatown Point.
sentences.cn: 唐城坊入口处的小舞台.

sentences.en: They then sell the phones to middlemen, usually at electronics stores in Chinatown, for about $750.
sentences.cn: 把货卖给在唐人街开手机店的中间人，他们能拿回大约750美元。

sentences.en: Vancouver has the biggest Chinatown in Canada, boasting a history of more than a century.
sentences.cn: 温哥华有加拿大最大的唐人街，已经有超过一个世纪的历史。

sentences.en: Where can I catch a bus to go to Chinatown?
Why the return to Liberty City for Chinatown Wars?
sentences.cn: 为什么返回自由城血战唐人街?

sentences.en: You can buy them at the gift shops in Chinatown.
sentences.cn: 你到唐人街的礼品店就能买得到.

trans.tran_en: an area in a city where there are Chinese restaurants and shops, and where a lot of Chinese people live
